creator: FE Bureau
title: ABG Shipyard: NCLT reschedules hearing on Liberty House bid
dc:creator: FE Bureau
content: The Ahmedabad bench of the NCLT has rescheduled the hearing on Liberty House Group’s bid for ABG Shipyard on account of non-appearance of the resolution professional (RP), Sundaresh Bhat. The bench will now hear the matter on June 25.
contentSnippet: The Ahmedabad bench of the NCLT has rescheduled the hearing on Liberty House Group’s bid for ABG Shipyard on account of non-appearance of the resolution professional (RP), Sundaresh Bhat. The bench will now hear the matter on June 25.
